sentences.en: By September, they will have whittled the list down to a winner.
sentences.cn: 9月之前他们会从名单中确定出最后的赢家。

sentences.en: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.cn: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.en: From September until December, Congress remained in session.
sentences.cn: 从9月到12月，国会一直都在开会。

sentences.en: He left the company by mutual consent last September.
sentences.cn: 去年9月，经双方同意，他离开了公司。

sentences.en: Her son, Jerome, was born in September.
Mr Lucas reassembled his team in September.
sentences.cn: 卢卡斯先生在9月重新召集了他的队伍。

sentences.en: New owners will have to wait until September before moving in.
sentences.cn: 新业主要等到9月份才能入住。

sentences.en: Open 19th July–6th September, Sun to Thurs incl.
sentences.cn: 7月19日至9月6日期间周日至周四开放。

sentences.en: Schools give a vacation from July 12 to September 1.
sentences.cn: 学校自7月12日到9月1日放假.

sentences.en: September is here, bringing with it a chill in the mornings.
The bridge was completed in September of the same year.
sentences.cn: 同年九月这座大桥竣工.

sentences.en: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.cn: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

sentences.en: The days are closing in now that it is September.
sentences.cn: 已是九月了,白天正变得越来越短.

sentences.en: The membership application came before the Council of Ministers in September.
sentences.cn: 会员申请书于9月提交部长会议审议。

sentences.en: The Peace of Ryswick was signed in September 1697.
The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.cn: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.en: They emerged triumphant in the September election.
sentences.cn: 他们在九月份的选举中大获全胜。

trans.tran_en: the ninth month of the year, between August and October
the ninth month of the year, between August and October
